workflow.description:
Workflow template to use for vCAC extensibility
Input parameters can be used using vCAC VM properties using the format ExternalWFStubs.[workflow stub name].[vCO input parameter name]. If using plug-in types you need to pass their unique vCO IDs.
Input parameters was tested successfully with : - string - plug-in input types - number - boolean

attrib.name: newFolder
attrib.description: The newly created folder, if no errors occur

attrib.name: timer
attrib.description: This timer item will wait until date and will continue workflow execution.
